caption.center: ANTHONY E. REVERE, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Hillsborough County; Kimberly K. Fernandez, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Ward v. State, 946 So. 2d 33 (Fla. 2d DCA 2006); Macalusov. State, 912 So. 2d 694 (Fla. 2d DCA 2005); Bizzell v. State,912 So. 2d 386 (Fla. 2d DCA 2005); Campbell v. State, 884 So. 2d 190 (Fla. 2d DCA 2004); Brown v. State, 827 So. 2d 1054 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002);Ives v. State, 993 So. 2d 117 (Fla. 4th DCA 2008), review denied,11 So. 3d 942 (Fla. 2009); Rangel v. State, 937 So. 2d 1218 (Fla. 3d DCA 2006); Sampson v. State, 832 So. 2d 251 (Fla. 5th DCA 2002).
WHATLEY, NORTHCUTT, and WALLACE, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED
